DeathSteel::

He looked at Kaiser. "Yes, I have one more chance. But yet, I choose 
to wait to see what you have to offer to this fight. All you have 
done is block my move. So now, I give you the chance. Please, step 
forward." He remained in the same stance, battle blade above his 
head, ready for what ever awaited him.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He shakes his head waiting for the third pass.  "You still 
have one 
> more chance DeathSteel.  I highly recommend you use it.  Your last 
pass was 
> quite good."  He too stands motionless, waiting.
